author: Not available
source: The Complete Corpus of Anglo-Saxon Poetry

text.0: Conuertere, domine, aliquantulum, et deprecabilis esto super seruos tuos.
text.3: Respice in seruos tuos et in opera tua, domine, et dirige filios eorum.
text.5: and on þin agen weorc,           ece drihten,
text.6: and heora bearn gerece           bliðum mode.
text.7: Et sit splendor domini dei nostri super nos, et opera manuum nostrarum dirige super nos, et opus manuum nostrarum dirige.
text.8: Wese us beorhtnys ofer           bliðan drihtnes,
text.9: ures þæs godan godes           georne ofer ealle;
text.10: gerece ure handgeweorc           heah ofer usic.
